title: First look at Ant McPartlin's return to I'm A Celebrity after last year's drink-drive shame
text:
ITV have released first look images at Ant McPartlin's grand return to I'm A Celebrity.

The presenter, 43, stars in the promotional trailer alongside Declan Donnelly, 44, which shows the pair setting sail for Australia but facing calamity when their map gets blown away by the high winds.

The big-budget trailer, which was filmed at a West London studio back in July, has seven alternative storylines and viewers must pick what the duo will face next on their treacherous journey.

First look: ITV have released first look images at Ant McPartlin's grand return to I'm A Celebrity

The first trailer will premiere on ITV on Saturday and fans of the show will be asked to vote whether Ant and Dec will face Tropical Tides or Artic Antics on the I'm A Celebrity app.

The big budget promo marks Ant's return to I'm A Celebrity after he took a step back from filming commitments last year and was replaced by Holly Willoughby.

A source previously told The Sun of Ant's return: 'The storyline for the promo is really funny, it’s a big and very expensive set-up with masses of special effects, but they wanted it to be right — especially for Ant’s return.

To the jungle: The presenter, 43, stars in the promotional trailer alongside Declan Donnelly, 44, where the pair set sail for Australia but face calamity when their map gets blown away

Interactive: The trailer, which was filmed at a West London studio back in July, has seven alternative storylines and viewers must pick what the duo will face next on their journey

'Holly was a fantastic stand-in and Dec enjoyed having her with him in Australia very much, but she always said it was a one-off.

'Ant is a huge part of the success of the series so everyone on the team was looking forward to working with him again.'

Last year, the star took a lengthy hiatus from screens to battle his addiction woes.

Battling the elements: The first trailer will premiere on ITV on Saturday and fans of the show will be asked to vote whether Ant and Dec will face Tropical Tides or Artic Antics

Ant previously credited girlfriend Anne-Marie Corbett for 'saving his life', after battling addiction, a drink-drive conviction and divorce.

The presenter made a return to television screens earlier in May for the new Britain's Got Talent as he makes a comeback to the showbiz circuit following a tough year.

He was arrested for drink-driving in March last year and his presenting partner Dec hosted the live Britain's Got Talent shows solo.

Ant's ex wife Lisa was granted a divorce him during a 30-second hearing at the Central Family Court in October last year.

The I'm a Celeb host and his teenage sweetheart had been together for 23 years; they were married in 2006 but announced their split in January last year.

The former flames first met in Newcastle in 1994 before they went onto exchange vows at a stunning country house in Buckinghamshire in 2006.
description: ITV have released first look images at Ant McPartlin's grand return to I'm A Celebrity.
